name: Yadea V7 (Blue) 960Wh
description:
Electric Scooter Yadea G5

To prevent fatigue from long rides, the G5 is equipped with a suspension system that reduces vibration, providing a smoother ride. The frame made of cold-rolled steel and aluminum rear suspension ensures the electric scooter has the necessary stability.

Hydraulic disc brakes provide handling and control, ensuring the device responds instantly to the rider’s actions.

7-Inch LCD Display and Full LED Lighting Technology

The electronic display with automatic brightness adjustment, GPS, Bluetooth, and scratch protection offers maximum comfort to the owner. The wide lighting range allows for confident night-time rides.

Lithium-Ion Battery

The G5 electric scooter is equipped with a 60V26Ah/60V32Ah battery type.

Disc Brakes

The G5 is fitted with hydraulic disc brakes with opposing cylinders at the front and rear, with a diameter of 220 mm.

Front and rear disc plates provide strong braking grip. Quality brakes – front drum, rear disc, and electric brakes – keep the G5 secure for your peace of mind!

Spacious Trunk

The G5 electric scooter is equipped with a storage compartment, adding even more convenience for you!

param.title: Disclaimer
param.value: The product may differ from the image shown; specifications and package contents may be changed by the manufacturer. Please check details with the manager.
